english_example_sentence: With our friends, we would have understood this complex topic better.
russian_example_sentence: С нашими друзьями мы бы лучше поняли эту сложную тему.
turkish_example_sentence: Arkadaşlarımızla bu karmaşık konuyu daha iyi anlayacaktık.
